text: Uta kandi naŋga haŋɨnɨŋ mɨŋavindamata, kru kɨmumu haŋɨnɨŋ andɨtɨra aŋga yahamɨramu. Kamata kru kandi lepra naŋga haŋɨnɨŋ andɨtɨra ñaŋɨraŋgɨyɨmu. Kamata sundɨ ñamba haŋɨnɨŋ pɨŋguvaramara. Narɨŋ sɨmbɨra mɨŋamɨŋarɨm yɨhɨramin vana nɨŋandɨhin mut mɨŋata mamɨŋara. Narɨ saŋ mɨŋara. Harɨm narɨ uta krunavundiŋ ŋguramata, mut mɨŋamɨŋarɨm maŋambamara.
